ids_info.name: calorimetry
ids_info.description: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems

calorimetry/group.documentation: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine). Within calorimetry IDS: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems.

calorimetry/group/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within calorimetry IDS: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems. Within group container: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine).

Within group container: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine).

Within component container: Set of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out. Within power container: Power extracted from the component.

calorimetry/group/component/power/validi.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within calorimetry IDS: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems. Within group container: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine). Within component container: Set of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out. Within power container: Power extracted from the component.

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within calorimetry IDS: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems. Within group container: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine). Within component container: Set of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out. Within power container: Power extracted from the component.
